attributes.action: Drop the NO SMOKING laws in pubs and bars
attributes.additional_details: Most people accept, and probably agree with, no smoking in the workplace, restaurants, most public buildings, etc but to have an entire ban in pubs and bars is just not playing ball. In many parts of Europe the ban has proved to be largely unenforceable, mainly because the locals just ignore it, but in England we have just rolled over, like we do with most things, and accepted it. At least let's have the old system of smoking / non smoking areas, thus giving us all a free choice

rejection.details: Please see petition "Amend the smoking ban".
